Posts.Content: Hi everyone, Last week I got the bad news that I have breast cancer. I am 32 years old and I feel completely lost and so ignorant about this disease. I don't know what to expect , how long is going to take,if I have done something wrong or if they have made a mistake with the diagnosis. i feel overwhelmed awaiting for my MRI this Friday. They havent said too much about it. just that I might be on stage 2. My lump is about 3cm. I want to stay positive but I am so anxious about what is coming. I can't even touch my breast because I feel scared. Should I get more info or just wait until the doctors say something else? I am so lost. Thanks!x
Posts.Title: recently diagnosed and I am so lost and scared

Posts.Content: Thanks Jane and Wendy for your words. I keep thinking it will be something to cure as quick as a cold but i need to be realistic that it will take time to pass this. I don't know how long tho,one month , 3 months uff .I just hope to be able to carry on with my life as normal as possible in the meantime. I will have lots of questions for sure. I hope I won't bombard you too much.xx

Posts.Content: Thanks Rosiero. I guess the best to do in this case is to join forces all together , be supportive with each other and stay positive as much as we can. I hope you get your results soon. Stay in touch. best
